dialogue.content: My wrist feels sore after working on my laptop all day.
Is it the mouse hand, keyboard hand, or both?
Got it. Does it improve on weekends or days off?
Yes, it's much better when I'm not working.
Okay. Are you willing to change your setup, or do you want small habits first?
Small habits first. I don't want to buy new gear right now.
Understood. Micro-changes during the day can help.
If I could reduce the soreness without buying anything, that would be perfect.
